page.title: 14Cornish Poet and Author
page.content: {Jack Clemo} is one of Cornwall's leading writers. His works are concerned with the local environment, working class society and religion. Jack was born in the Trethosa area. He went rather unhappily to Trethosa School although he made one unsuccessful attempt to attend the school at Foxhole which was nearer to his home. He continued to live until has later years in a humble cottage at {Goonamarris}and to attend{Trethosa {Chapel}where he was married. His best man was the poet{Charles Causley.}He was handicapped from his early years and became deaf and blind. Jack Clemo's work and life have been the subject of television documentaries and a crew filmed with his help at the school.
